message: Let's start with a fair split, and we can negotiate from here.
You were too generous in round 1, now it's my turn to be greedy!
You're being greedy, I'll take a smaller share, but I'm not going to give you everything!
You're getting desperate, I'm taking advantage of your generosity!
You're pushing your luck, Bob. I'll give you a bigger share, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of!
You're getting close to giving me everything, don't say I didn't warn you!
I'm not going to give you everything, but I'm not sure I have a choice at this point...
You're running out of options, I'm taking the last crumbs!
